this is the game that got me into gaming and it has a very dear place in my heart. its been going through a rough patch for a long while now but please do not let that stop you from playing this game, avoid quick play and play on community servers for a more enjoyable time. or you can brave it out and queue for quick play either way please be patient with it and you wont be disappointed.

Team fortress two is a very good first person shooter. It allows for both team and solo gameplay as you can play as whoever you want and not have a large impact on your team. There‚Äôs also unlimited amount of cosmetics misc and weapons to use there‚Äôs literally endless possibilities.

Team fortress 2 is a good game and always will be, although there are a few problems with the game. The biggest one is  the bots, the bots in TF2 are basically  fake players with AimBot, and it ruins the game for everyone, other then that and half ass toxic community the game is actually a well made game,  and its not dying to this day, if anything  its just dry cause the Developers lack the updates for the game, and hasn't been an actual  update in months. overall i recommend the game but just make sure to vote kick the bots if you ever see one on your team.
great game really fun. The only infuriating thing about this game is the aimbots and script kiddies, otherwise its an addicting game

dont tell me to go find a competitive match, it literally takes 2 hours to find one.

one of my childhood games of all,really do recommend for this amazing game but i used to play on my old account then i forgot my password so i had to make a new account and sadly we lost Rick May on April 2020 RIP i cant believed he's gone...gosh.I didnt know tht they added levels and tiers to the game so i had a lot of fun playing with Casual Mode but for some reason the Competitive Mode took way too long so they had to fix tht.. this game is 10 years old but gold. I'm not that kind of person who plays since 2007 because I play this game since 2016 but I can tell that this game is great. Sometimes I got tired of the game but I came after a year or some months to play it again. Nowadays It has some flies like those bots who snipe you without even looking at you and making kazoo with chainsaw noises and It's sad that this game can't be Newbie Friendly because of the bots. Also I really wish this game had more Valve and Community Servers with different maps which aren't ctf_2fort or ctf_turbine or even cp_dustbowl. I wish there were some maps like cp_burghausen which is Medieval Attack Defend and works like cp_dustbowl and It has more space than cp_degrootkeep. + Let's hope there will be New Update which adds New Weapons, Maps and such. Don't take it in bad way but pl_pier isn't enough.
